players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked by Diana's sudden death. We must stay focused and find out who did this."
Charlie: "I think we should investigate Alice's alibi for the time of Diana's death."
You: "I have an alibi for the night of Diana's death. I was at the outskirts of the town, gathering herbs for my potions. Anyone who wants to check can ask the villagers living near the outskirts."
